responses: What can I do for you!
BEE is a clothing shop focusing on promoting sustainability. We sell a variety of products such as shirts, pants, dresses, shoes. We also take in well-loved clothes looking for a second home!
We only ship within Singapore with a flat rate of $5. Purchases can be expected to receive within 3 working days.
Ensure that you have signed in to your account. From the top navigation bar, click on 'blog', find 'add blog', and start writing!

Start by filling in our trade-in form on our website. Our staffs will review your clothes and if it is approved, you can send it to us immediately. Once we received your clothes, shopping vouchers will be gifted straight into your account.

patterns: what are the opening hours of your shop
responses: Unfortunately, we do not have a physical store. :(
